sources.title: Always Goodbye (1938)
sources.description: Following the death of her fiancé, Margot Weston is left pregnant and unmarried. Former doctor Jim Howard helps the desperate Margot. When her son is born, Jim helps her find a home for the baby with Phil Marshall and his wife. Margot insists that neither the Marshalls nor the child can ever know that she is his mother. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/always-goodbye-1938/

metadata.Plot: A woman must decide between two men: one she loves, the other she admires and respects.
metadata.Writer: Douglas Z. Doty, Gilbert Emery, Kathryn Scola
metadata.Actors: Barbara Stanwyck, Herbert Marshall, Ian Hunter
